CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high V oc of almost 1 V is consistent with the low - lying HOMO energy level of PSFDTBT.

Let's think step by step.

1. V: Voltage or electric potential, not a material, but a physical property.
2. almost 1 V: Voltage or electric potential, not a material, but a physical property.
3. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

PSFDTBT.

This is the material name mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high V oc of almost 1 V is consistent with the low - lying HOMO energy level of PSFDTBT.

Let's think step by step.

1. Voc: Voltage of the electrochemical cell under open circuit conditions.
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital of the donor molecule (in this case, PSFDTBT).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Voc: Voltage
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (a material property related to the electronic structure of a molecule)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high V oc of almost 1 V is consistent with the low - lying HOMO energy level of PSFDTBT.

Let's think step by step.

1. Voc: Voltage of the photovoltaic cell or the voltage at which the photovoltaic material becomes a p-n junction when no external voltage is applied.
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital, which is an energy level in a molecule where the highest probability of finding an electron exists.
3. PSFDTBT: A specific type of photovoltaic material or organic semiconductor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Voc: Voltage (a material property)
2. HOMO energy level: Energy level (a material property)
3. PSFDTBT: The specific material (a substance or object) with the identified material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Such high Voc of almost 1 V |
| The low-lying HOMO energy level of PSFDTBT |
| The voltage of the photovoltaic cell for PSFDTBT is high, approximately 1 V |
| The highest occupied molecular orbital energy level of PSFDTBT is low-lying |
| The specific material: PSFDTBT has a high voltage (Voc) of almost 1 V and a low-lying HOMO energy level. |
